jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Provides well-documented data structures and utilities for Pokémon games written in Java.

org.jpokemon.pmapi.util
Enum ExperienceCurve

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ExperienceCurve>
      org.jpokemon.pmapi.util.ExperienceCurve
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ExperienceCurve>
public enum ExperienceCurve
extends Enum<ExperienceCurve>

Defines the available experience curves for a Pokémon. For justification, see the entry in Bulbapedia.

Enum Constant Summary
ERRATIC
          Indicates the Pokémon has an Erratic experience curve.
FAST
          Indicates the Pokémon has a Fast experience curve.
FLUCTUATING
          Indicates the Pokémon has a Fluctuating experience curve.
MEDIUM_FAST
          Indicates the Pokémon has a Medium Fast experience curve.
MEDIUM_SLOW
          Indicates the Pokémon has a Medium Slow experience curve.
SLOW
          Indicates the Pokémon has a Slow experience curve.
